rules.content: Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may pay {r} to exile a red nonland card from your hand. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and it cost {r} (or {1}) less to cast.
As long as ~ is accompanied by a creature card, it gets +1/+1.

tags.setting: A friendly goat wearing tribal markings sits by a warm campfire, gesturing invitingly with its hoof while shadows of approaching creatures dance in the firelight.
